channel.title: 被美国剥夺普惠制待遇的某大国GDP增速降至5.8%
channel.description: 被美国剥夺普惠制待遇的某大国GDP增速降至5.8%

item.title: 被美国剥夺普惠制待遇的某大国GDP增速降至5.8%[0-50]
item.description:
被美国剥夺普惠制待遇的某大国GDP增速降至5.8% 本帖最后由 废狗 于 2019-6-2 18:22 编辑
GDP growth falls to 5.8% in January-March quarter, falls below China印度第4季度GDP增速降至5.8%，低于中国注：印度财年为每年4月1日至次年3月31日，1月-3月为第四季度NEW DELHI: India's GDP (gross domestic product) growth for the January-March (Q4) quarter slowed to 5.8 per cent from 6.6 per cent in the previous (October-December) quarter, government data showed on Friday. This is the slowest GDP growth rate in five years, due to poor performance in agricultural and manufacturing sectors. The previous low was 6.4 per cent in 2013-14.新德里：印度政府上周五公布的数据显示，1 - 3月(第四季度)印度GDP增速从上一季度(10 - 12月)的6.6%放缓至5.8%。由于农业和制造业表现不佳，印度GDP创下5年来的最低增速，此前的低点是2013年至2014年的6.4%。Meanwhile, India's unemployment rate rose to 6.1% in 2017/18 fiscal year, according to data released by the statistics ministry.与此同时，印度统计部门发布的数据显示，2017-2018财年印度失业率升至6.1%。The announcement of GDP figures meant that India lost its place as the world's fastest-growing major economy to China, which is currently on 6.4 percent growth.该GDP数据的公布意味着印度丧失了全球增长最快的主要经济体地位，取而代之的是中国，目前中国的经济增长率为6.4%。The joblessness among male on all India basis was 6.2 per cent, while it was 5.7 per cent in case of females.印度男性的失业率为6.2%，女性失业率为5.7%。http://i.santaihu.com/india/2019-06-01/18a7e26b9e2b2f038408b7cc146587a8.jpg印度时报读者的评论：译文来源：三泰虎 http://www.santaihu.com/47753.html外文：https://timesofindia.indiatimes.comkush patel • 15 hours agoThe gdp will rise as modi sir is back on the throne !随着莫迪先生重登总理宝座，印度GDP将会蹭蹭蹭的往上涨!Pethuru Raj Chelliah 14 hours agoThe GDP was at 9 percent during the MMS period and it was brought down by the Modi government. I do not know what will happen during his second term辛格执政期间，印度GDP增速为9%，而莫迪政府创下了最低点。不知道在莫迪的第二个任期内会怎么样。Ram Mishra• 986 • Pethuru Raj Chelliah • 1 hour agoIndia never ever reached at gdp growth rate of 9%, where did you get this data?印度GDP增长率从来没有达到过9%，你从哪得到的这个数据?
Krish• 6577Pethuru Raj Chelliah • india • 12 hours agoDon''t lie. If you have to quote, quote proper data@Pethuru Raj Chelliah别撒谎了。要引用数据，就引用正确的数据
Ravikumarlokpure• 1551 • amit • 15 hours agoCloud technology will save our economy云技术将拯救我们的经济
Srinivas Murthy • Bangalore, India • 15 hours agowe should control population or else unemployment will increase ...我们应该控制人口，否则失业会增加。
rinivas Murthy • 11 hours agowe should control unemployment or population will get automatically controlled.... LOL我们应该控制失业，人口自然能得到控制。哈哈
Sayantan Bhattacharya• 37 • Sayantan • 15 hours agoidiots will still back the chaiwala who is screwing the economy with his height of unknowingness白痴们仍然会支持卖茶人，这个卖茶人什么都不懂，搞砸了经济
Samantha Dalvi • 15 hours agoModiji... Kamaal Ho Gayaa! people still voted for you?莫迪，大家还会投票给你吗？
Satyamev Jayate • 15 hours agoThis quarter has been bisy with elections and share market dropped because of electionNext quarter will be back on track stronger and biggerSee it本季度，莫迪一直忙于选举，因而经济走下坡路下个季度将重回正轨，并且提速拭目以待satyamev jayate • Mumbai • 13 hours agothis figure was before elections.这数据是选举前的。
Rakesh • 15 hours agoWHO CARES ? CHANT MODI MODI MODI OUR PROBLEMS IN LIFE WILL BE SOLVED .谁在乎？只要歌颂莫迪，我们生活中的一切问题都能解决
K Mohan • Hyderabad • 15 hours agoDoes not matter. The whole three months the entire country was busy with elections and hence the performance may be low.没关系。整整三个月举国上下都在忙选举，经济表现才会低迷。
Navneet Saini• 3 • Navneet Saini • 14 hours agoIndia will vote for modi even if unemployment would be 20% because bjp entertain people by Hindu - Muslim , blame everything on Congress and Pakistan , India deserve modi and RSS FASCISM即使失业率达到20%，印度人也会投票给莫迪
Vinod.raj42 • Location • 14 hours agoHahaha....Fooled for 5 more years....哈哈哈....又被忽悠了5年…
Monica • New Delhi • 15 hours agoThe election is over, and reality replaces illusion!选举结束了，现实取代了幻想!
Sky • 15 hours agoUnemployment worst in 45 years and GDP lowest in 25 years. Educated people of Kerala & Punjab knew it before elections but bhakts from rest of India learnt it after elections. Wait and see India become another Taliban style country in next 5 years under liars and thugs.失业率创45年来新低，GDP创25年来新低。有文化的喀拉拉邦和旁遮普人在选举前就知道了，印度其他地方的人在选举后才知道。等着瞧吧，印度会在未来5年成为另一个塔利班式国家，由骗子和暴徒统治。
Dr Vidyadhar Yellutla • Bangalore • 15 hours agoWorld bank predicted 7.2% GDP for this year but fallen to 6.8% may be due to less agricultural production, but really it is a setback as we plan to occupy 4th position in near future. But, I feel confident as Modi brought reforms like GST to get India from 144 position to 77 position in ease of doing business and got 60 billion $ FDI on an average, he will definintely work hard to keep India as fastest growing economy.世界银行预计印度今年GDP增速将达到7.2%，现在降到了6.8%，原因可能是农业生产减少，但这确实是一个挫折，我们原本计划在不久的将来跻身全球第四的位置。莫迪带来了诸如消费税这样的改革，让印度经商便利度从第144位上升到第77位，获得600亿美元的外国直接投资，莫迪一定会努力让印度保持增长最快经济体的地位。
Rajagopalan • Chennai • 15 hours agoit's mainly because of the lies that the Congress spread in the market and fear that Congress may come to power. things will change in the next quarter都怪国大党在市场上散布谎言，以及民众担心国大党可能会掌权。下个季度情况将逆转。
Scotch Bright• 966 • Scotch Bright • 14 hours agoRahul Announced 72000/- per annum, most idiots believed and stop working, now they are job less拉胡尔宣布给每人每年发72000卢比，大多数白痴信了，然后不事生产，现在他们都失业了。
Rocker• 102 • Rocker • 15 hours agoNehru is responsible for all this , he died early had he been alive today it would not have happened .尼赫鲁要对这一切负责，他死得太早了。如果他今天还活着，就不会发生这种事了。
Joe Kool• 235 • Joe • 15 hours agoGDP dipped because all the scamsters ( dynasty, Congress, self loathing Hindus and opposition parties) were pumping money out of the country knowing that BJP will win.Time for Modiji to prosecute all these scamsters.GDP增速下降是因为所有的骗子(国大党和反对党)都知道人民党会赢，所以把钱转到国外了。莫迪是时候起诉这些骗子了。
Jd • 15 hours agoremember the news come after election.. no media were guts to show the TRUTH.这消息是在选举之后公布的。在此之前没有媒体敢揭露真相。
Mudassir Ali 291 • Mudassir Ali • 14 hours agoModi is the reason it''s all time low.这都怪莫迪
Mukesh • 15 hours agoWhy these figures coming so late. ? Waiting for election to be over?为什么数据这么迟才公布?等着选举结束吗?
Shinto James • Location • 14 hours agoBJP AND MODI GOOD IN MARKETING人民党和莫迪只擅长营销
Indian first• 2382 • Indian • Mumbai • 14 hours agothank goodness modi 2.0 replaced modi 1.0 otherwise feku would blame Congress and Nehru again.谢天谢地，莫迪连任了，否则会再次指责国大党和尼赫鲁。
Gadkari • 13 hours agoWait some more time. FEKU Ji''s Vision will take India back to 1947.假以时日，莫迪会让印度倒退到1947年.Nikhil Sharma• 81 • Gadkari • 9 hours agoAnd pappu''s vision will take us to 1847如果是拉胡尔的话，会把印度带回到1847年。
Rohit Mohan • 13 hours agoIt will get worse as modi is all about hindutva and they dont care about development.还会下降，因为莫迪只关心印度教，不关心发展。
Gadkari • 13 hours agoShri Modi Ji has achieved what Congress could not achieve in 45 Years. Next target is to bring India''s GDP to 1947 level.莫迪实现了国大党45年来无法实现的目标。下一个目标是让印度的GDP衰退到1947年的水平。
L u Indi• 4151 • Sushant Singh • 14 hours agoDo you think Congress would’ve done a better job难道你们认为如果是国大党执政的话，情况会更好？
item.content:encoded:
废狗:
被美国剥夺普惠制待遇的某大国GDP增速降至5.8%
本帖最后由 废狗 于 2019-6-2 18:22 编辑
GDP growth falls to 5.8% in January-March quarter, falls below China印度第4季度GDP增速降至5.8%，低于中国注：印度财年为每年4月1日至次年3月31日，1月-3月为第四季度NEW DELHI: India's GDP (gross domestic product) growth for the January-March (Q4) quarter slowed to 5.8 per cent from 6.6 per cent in the previous (October-December) quarter, government data showed on Friday. This is the slowest GDP growth rate in five years, due to poor performance in agricultural and manufacturing sectors. The previous low was 6.4 per cent in 2013-14.新德里：印度政府上周五公布的数据显示，1 - 3月(第四季度)印度GDP增速从上一季度(10 - 12月)的6.6%放缓至5.8%。由于农业和制造业表现不佳，印度GDP创下5年来的最低增速，此前的低点是2013年至2014年的6.4%。Meanwhile, India's unemployment rate rose to 6.1% in 2017/18 fiscal year, according to data released by the statistics ministry.与此同时，印度统计部门发布的数据显示，2017-2018财年印度失业率升至6.1%。The announcement of GDP figures meant that India lost its place as the world's fastest-growing major economy to China, which is currently on 6.4 percent growth.该GDP数据的公布意味着印度丧失了全球增长最快的主要经济体地位，取而代之的是中国，目前中国的经济增长率为6.4%。The joblessness among male on all India basis was 6.2 per cent, while it was 5.7 per cent in case of females.印度男性的失业率为6.2%，女性失业率为5.7%。http://i.santaihu.com/india/2019-06-01/18a7e26b9e2b2f038408b7cc146587a8.jpg印度时报读者的评论：译文来源：三泰虎 http://www.santaihu.com/47753.html外文：https://timesofindia.indiatimes.comkush patel • 15 hours agoThe gdp will rise as modi sir is back on the throne !随着莫迪先生重登总理宝座，印度GDP将会蹭蹭蹭的往上涨!Pethuru Raj Chelliah 14 hours agoThe GDP was at 9 percent during the MMS period and it was brought down by the Modi government. I do not know what will happen during his second term辛格执政期间，印度GDP增速为9%，而莫迪政府创下了最低点。不知道在莫迪的第二个任期内会怎么样。Ram Mishra• 986 • Pethuru Raj Chelliah • 1 hour agoIndia never ever reached at gdp growth rate of 9%, where did you get this data?印度GDP增长率从来没有达到过9%，你从哪得到的这个数据?

Wait and see India become another Taliban style country in next 5 years under liars and thugs.失业率创45年来新低，GDP创25年来新低。有文化的喀拉拉邦和旁遮普人在选举前就知道了，印度其他地方的人在选举后才知道。等着瞧吧，印度会在未来5年成为另一个塔利班式国家，由骗子和暴徒统治。

But, I feel confident as Modi brought reforms like GST to get India from 144 position to 77 position in ease of doing business and got 60 billion $ FDI on an average, he will definintely work hard to keep India as fastest growing economy.世界银行预计印度今年GDP增速将达到7.2%，现在降到了6.8%，原因可能是农业生产减少，但这确实是一个挫折，我们原本计划在不久的将来跻身全球第四的位置。莫迪带来了诸如消费税这样的改革，让印度经商便利度从第144位上升到第77位，获得600亿美元的外国直接投资，莫迪一定会努力让印度保持增长最快经济体的地位。
Rajagopalan • Chennai • 15 hours agoit's mainly because of the lies that the Congress spread in the market and fear that Congress may come to power. things will change in the next quarter都怪国大党在市场上散布谎言，以及民众担心国大党可能会掌权。下个季度情况将逆转。
Scotch Bright• 966 • Scotch Bright • 14 hours agoRahul Announced 72000/- per annum, most idiots believed and stop working, now they are job less拉胡尔宣布给每人每年发72000卢比，大多数白痴信了，然后不事生产，现在他们都失业了。
Rocker• 102 • Rocker • 15 hours agoNehru is responsible for all this , he died early had he been alive today it would not have happened .尼赫鲁要对这一切负责，他死得太早了。如果他今天还活着，就不会发生这种事了。
Joe Kool• 235 • Joe • 15 hours agoGDP dipped because all the scamsters ( dynasty, Congress, self loathing Hindus and opposition parties) were pumping money out of the country knowing that BJP will win.Time for Modiji to prosecute all these scamsters.GDP增速下降是因为所有的骗子(国大党和反对党)都知道人民党会赢，所以把钱转到国外了。莫迪是时候起诉这些骗子了。
